mapper.select: SELECT rsv_no, (SELECT user_id FROM kap_user WHERE user_no = reserve.user_no) AS user_id, (SELECT br_name FROM brewery WHERE br_id = reserve.br_id) AS br_name, rsv_day, rsv_time, rsv_count, rsv_price, rsv_name, rsv_tel, rsv_request, rsv_state, TO_CHAR(rsv_fin_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS rsv_fin_date FROM reserve WHERE rsv_no = #{rsv_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE reserve SET rsv_day = #{rsv_day}, rsv_time = #{rsv_time}, rsv_count = #{rsv_count}, rsv_price = #{rsv_count} * (SELECT br.br_price FROM brewery br, reserve rsv WHERE br.br_id = rsv.br_id), rsv_name = #{rsv_name}, rsv_tel = #{rsv_tel}, rsv_request = #{rsv_request}, rsv_fin_date = SYSDATE WHERE rsv_no = #{rsv_no}
